test_fe: cd frontend && npm install && npm test
test_be: encore test ./note ./pexels -cover && encore test ./note ./pexels -cover -v 2>&1 | go-junit-report -set-exit-code > test-results/backend-report.xml
deploy: yq -i e '.environments[${ENV_NUM}].image.tag = env(CONTAINER_TAG)| (... | select(tag == "!!merge")) tag = ""' values.yaml
if [[ -z $(git status -s) ]]; then echo "The container tags have already been updated to: $IMAGE_TAG. Deployment skipped..." && exit 0; fi
